channel.title: Flock of wolves - Red wolves win!
channel.description:
## Welcome
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay This game is nightless as such there are no timers When a player gets the majority of votes they die and flip immediately. When someone gets majority you may not talk until they flip The game ends when any single Wolf team controls 50% or greater of the votes at once or when all wolves are eliminates. If 2 wolf teams achieve this at the same time then everyone loses There are no private chats of any kind There is no way to die besides being lynched
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist:
[details="Role cards"] > # [color = "green"] Villager [/color] > > Your weapon is your vote. Watch out, you are out numbered. Trust no one > > *Goal: Eliminate all of the werewolves*
> # [color = "red"] Red Wolf [/color] > > The wolves outnumber the town but that doesn't mean you can stop hiding. Your partner is [REDACTED]. > > *Goal: Control 50% of the votes before any other wolf team does*
> # [color = "blue"] Blue Wolf [/color] > > The wolves outnumber the town but that doesn't mean you can stop hiding. Your partner is [REDACTED]. > > *Goal: Control 50% of the votes before any other wolf team does*
> # [color = "Yellow"] Yellow Wolf [/color] > > The wolves outnumber the town but that doesn't mean you can stop hiding. Your partner is [REDACTED]. > > *Goal: Control 50% of the votes before any other wolf team does* [/details]
**[color = "green"] Villager [/color]** **[color = "green"] Villager [/color]** **[color = "green"] Villager [/color]** **[color = "green"] Villager [/color]** **[color = "red"] Red Wolf [/color]** **[color = "red"] Red Wolf [/color]** **[color = "blue"] Blue Wolf [/color]** **[color = "blue"] Blue Wolf [/color]** **[color = "Yellow"] Yellow Wolf [/color]** **[color = "Yellow"] Yellow Wolf [/color]**
Players: 1. @Geyde - Alive 2. @Marluxion - Alive 3. @PoisonedSquid - Alive 4. @Mercenary - Alive 5. @Wazza - Alive 6. @Reaper - Alive 7. @Kirefitten - Alive 8. @Isaac_Gonzalez - Alive 9. @DatBird - Alive 10. @CetaComputer - Alive
[Day 1̸͈͆ Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/flock-of-wolves-confirmation/74247/261)
